title: A Gangsta's Pledge 4
description: It’s said that “what doesn’t kill you makes you stronger”. But in the case of Saint and Nya it may actually be what destroys their relationship once and for all… The night of the engagement was almost perfect. Nya and Saint were so close to having it all. That was before… Now there’s no more running from the past. Follow the entire “family” in the final installment of A Gangsta’s Pledge.
author: E.L. Griffin
